name: ALT Workstation
summary: Operating system and application suite designed for workplace at both office and home.
description:
ALT Workstation 9 installed on a laptop or desktop provides a classic personal workplace allowing to:
  • work with internet (web, email, instant messaging);
  • edit texts, spreadsheets and presentations (office suite);
  • listen to music and watch videos (multimedia);
  • create and improve raster and vector images;
  • perform mathematical computations;
  • develop software
  • ...and much more!
The downloaded version can be freely used by private persons; legal entities can use it for testing but production use requires acquiring licenses or signing a license agreement in written form.

name: ALT Server
summary: Operating system and services to bring up and control enterprise IT infrastructure.
description:
ALT Server 9 provides reliable foundation for enterprise IT infrastructure, including:
  • modern scalable high-performance databases;
  • virtualization;
  • infrastructure management tools;
  • Active Directory and FreeIPA domain integration;
  • extensive set of internet and intranet services.
The downloaded version can be freely used by private persons; legal entities can use it for testing but production use requires acquiring licenses or signing a license agreement in written form.

name: ALT Education
summary: Operating system for all kinds of educational institutions from preschool to high school which provides integration of both students' and teacher's workplaces.
description:
ALT Education 9 is aimed to ease the modern effective learning process for educational institutions at any level, including schools, colleges and universities. The distribution includes a wide range of desktop and server applications allowing to integrate students' and teacher's workplaces providing rich functionality.

The downloaded version can be freely used by private persons; legal entities can use it for testing but production use requires acquiring licenses or signing a license agreement in written form.

name: ALT Simply
summary: An operating system for everyone. Easy to use and doesn't demand much resources, functional and secure.
description: Simply Linux is easy to install and comfortable to work with, allowing users to do everyday tasks without worrying about viruses and without requiring frequent internet searches for new programs. Simply Linux includes more than 30 programs oriented to satisfy the needs of most users. This package also includes a wide array of drivers, allowing easy operation.
